casebody.data:
IN RE: RANKIN 192P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 16, 2017 Erin Rozzelle, Attorney at Law, for Bailey, Mozijah. Otha Townsend, Attorney at Law, for Substitute Trustee Services, Inc. Jeffrey A. Bunda, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Deutsche Bank National Trust Company.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2017 by Respondent (Mozijah Bailey) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of June 2017."
